title: The Red Prince
description: Tamiron Lluch, beloved Prince and respected not only to his Empire but the neighboring kingdoms. Expected to rule with a good heart and honor. The very embodiement of the Trasidar Empireâ€™s values. But one day, without any explanation he turned against his home, leaving death on his wake.Seven Warriors, with the man who trained the prince himself leading them, Sevidon. They must unite in order to stop the once, beloved Prince for his treachery could spell the doom of the Empire and the remaining kingdoms, for should they fail, would mean their ultimate demise.
author: Stephen Lucas Lacroix
